target_audience: Women, 18-45, interested in skincare and beauty products
color_scheme: Teal, gold, white, with pops of red, green, and yellow. Creates a festive and inviting mood.
composition: Product-focused, with a festive background and product arrangement on a platform.
special_elements: Price discount (up to 73% off), limited-time offer (Ramadan Rush Sale 8th-10th April), product benefits highlighted, brand logos.
